title: Amber Rose is joined by her two baby daddy's AE and Wiz Khalifa for son's baseball game
text:
She welcomed her second son, Slash Electric Alexander, with her boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards two weeks ago.

And Amber Rose ensured her new bundle of joy wasn't taking all her attention, spotted attending her elder son Sebastian Taylor Thomaz' baseball game with her ex-boyfriend, Wiz Khalifa on Sunday.

The duo proved their effortless parenting style as they stepped out in high spirits for the game in Los Angeles.

Scroll down for video

Supportive mama: Amber Rose showcased her incredible postpartum physique on Sunday when she stepped out to watch her son Sebastian, six, play his baseball match alongside her boyfriend and ex

And while her new son wasn't with her, the doting mom didn't forget about him, rocking a Slash Electric T-shirt - her favorite band which she named her child after.

She completed her postpartum look with black tights and added a Dodger's cap to match the rest of the family.

The actress accessorised with a pair of earrings and appeared to be wearing a minimal amount of makeup.

Amber was joined by her baby daddy, AE at the game.

He proved he was a supportive step-dad, wearing an LA Dodger's ensemble to cheer Sebastian on.

Love at the game: Amber was joined by her baby daddy, AE at the game

The whole family's here: Joined by the couple and also wearing the rep team's shirt was Sebastian's dad, Wiz Khalifa

Joined by the couple and also wearing the rep team's shirt was Sebastian's dad, Wiz Khalifa.

Amber hilariously shared a sweet throwback photo of herself as a fellow baseball player back in the day on Instagram on Sunday.

She posed for the photo with pigtails and a cap and was seen with a large pair of round glasses on her face.

The model has similarly shard some images of her son playing the sport in the moment.

There in spirit: And while her new son wasn't with her, the doting mom didn't forget about him- rocking a Slash Electric T-shirt - her favorite band which she named her child after

It runs in the family: Amber hilariously shared a sweet throwback photo of herself as a fellow baseball player back in the day on Instagram on Sunday

'My Sweet Lil Chicken Nugget,' she recently captioned on social media.

Amber's appearance comes after she welcomed her second child into the world on October 10, 2019.

She announced her pregnancy back in April with an Instagram post of her growing baby bump on full display.

'[Alexander] and I are SUPER excited to announce that we have a sweet little baby boy on the way!' she wrote in the caption.

'P.S Sebastian is soooooo happy to be a big brother!' she added.

Concentrating: The model has similarly shard some images of her son playing the sport in the moment

In May, Amber divulged that she suffers from hyperemesis gravidarum, 'a condition characterized by severe nausea, vomiting, weight loss, and electrolyte disturbance,' according to the American Pregnancy Association.

'I want to be cute. I want to show off my belly, but I just can’t get off this couch!' Amber said in an Instagram video in May.

'I’m tired, and I just want to barf all day, it’s just not fun. But it’s totally worth it.'

Amber and AE met in 2015, but didn't start dating until 2018.
description: Amber Rose showcased her incredible postpartum physique on Sunday when she stepped out to watch her son Sebastian, six, play his baseball match alongside her boyfriend and ex.
